kickstart.description: BIOTOOLS blat - http://genome.ucsc.edu bowtie - http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net bowtie2 - http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net/bowtie2 bwa - http://bio-bwa.sourceforge.net GenomeAnalysisTK - http://www.broadinstitute.org/gatk samtools - http://samtools.sourceforge.net soapdenovo - http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soapdenovo.html velvet - http://www.ebi.ac.uk/~zerbino/velvet GMAP-GSNAP (Genomic Mapping and Alignment Program,Genomic Short-read Nucleotide Alignment Program http://research-pub.gene.com/gmap/ Trinity (Inchworm, Chrysalis,Butterfly) http://trinityrnaseq.sourceforge.net/ Cufflinks http://cufflinks.cbcb.umd.edu/ Tophat http://tophat.cbcb.umd.edu/ fastx http://hannonlab.cshl.edu/fastx_toolkit
